X.ii.4.A.1.i
.
Authorizing Reexamination
Authorize an examination if evidence, medical or otherwise, received prior to expiration of the first 60-day notice period in accordance with
38 CFR 3.105(e)
, establishes a reasonable basis for reexamination.
Notes
:
Defer final rating action pending the outcome of the new examination.
An examination that is the basis for reduction must be as thorough as the examination that established the current rating.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Rating Decisions for Reduction Due to Improvement
